title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Peer Feedback Strategies in Online Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design peer feedback protocols for each stage of project development in an online environment.
For math education projects, learners can provide specific and actionable feedback on peers' work at least 80% of the time.
Learners can create project improvement plans reflecting feedback and perform at least three revision-sharing cycles.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
